full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM GYI BSGOM BZLAS NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GNAD DON SNYING PO DANG DE'I BKA' SDOD BSRUNG BCAS KYI MCHOD THABS 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM KYI BSGOM BZLAS BYED TSUL MDOR BSDUS PA GNAD DON SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GI NYAMS LEN RGYUN 'KHYER DU, ,BTZUN GZUGS ^ DAM TSIG RDO RJES DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN 'KHYER BDE GNAD TSANG DON 'DUS SU BKOD PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
